member.name: M:Gost_Project.Helpers.RegexHelper.EmailRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[\\w-\\.]+@([\\w-]+\\.)+[\\w-]{2,5}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [-.\w] atomically at least once.
○ Match '@'.
○ Loop greedily at least once.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [-\w] atomically at least once.
○ Match '.'.
○ Match a character in the set [-\w] atomically at least 2 and at most 5 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
